rukus.text: Indeed Allah will admit those who have faith and do righteous deeds into gardens with streams running in them, adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their dress therein will be silk
They were guided to chaste belief, and guided to the path of the All-laudable

Indeed those who are faithless and bar from the way of Allah and the Sacred Mosque, which We have made for all people, the native and the visitor being equal thereinâ€”whoever wrongfully tries to commit violation in it, We shall make him taste a painful punishment
